ch.epfl.lasec.mova
Class ConfirmationProtocol

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.mova.ConfirmationProtocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
InteractiveProof
public class ConfirmationProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements InteractiveProof

Class used to implement the MOVA confirmation protocol. The main methods are the prover side and the verifier side of the protocol.
For more information on the protocol refer to the GHIproof protocol in MOVA.

Author:
Sebastien Duc
